title: vAzhkkai periyadoru
sahitya:
vAzhkkai periyadoeu tOTTam adil vannap-paravaigaLin kUTTam


anupallavi

  vAzhkkai vinai aruviyOTTam kavi vANar magizhndiDum koNDATTam inda


caraNam    maramonru kiLai palavAmE tUya manamonru madam palavAmE
taraiyonru payir pala uyironru palavuDal sattonru cittADum shuddha shakti vilAsam
